section.name: Course Introduction
section.summary:
Welcome to Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion: From Awareness to Action. This section will provide an overview of the concepts introduced in the course as well as get you started with completing your first DEI self-assessment. By the end of this section, you will be able to:

  • Discover the primary focus areas of the course.
  • Understand the expectation that you will create actionable steps toward DEI by course completion.
  • Determine areas of importance for yourself based on the DEI self-assessment.

After you complete the activities in this section, return to the main course page to begin Unit 1, “Understanding and Defining DEI.”
